scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle and pink undergarment, embracing Elizabeth, who wears a vibrant orange gown and a grey veil. Both figures have golden halos, indicating their saintly status. They stand in a garden setting with stylized green trees against a dark blue, star-like background. To the right, a stone building with arched openings and a small window is visible, suggesting a domestic or religious structure. The composition emphasizes the tender reunion and spiritual significance of the encounter.
